Saksnummer 2025/11351 Dato for vedtaket 08.04.2025 Dato mottatt vedtak 08.04.2025 Ønsket endring - begrunnelse And why I said that Stian has tricked me that is. Stian knew that I did not like their business. Therefore we were negotiating about compensation for the damages due to their construction work. Stian of course promised not to do any construction until the day of the conclusion on the compensation. Therefore I was cooperating with Olsen Wax, who is in charge of the construction of the Folk&røvere, by adjusting their construction preparation time and my therapy time. BK057-FELLES-klage-vedtak, Bergen kommune Side 1 av 2 Klage på vedtak But a few days ago, I was suddenly notified from Stian that he said he will start construction on 14th April with a legal construction permit. Without any message about compensation. That means he just used me for earning time until the Bergen community aksept it. It is really unfair.
